title: Media Bias in Covering Palestine and Israel
itunes:title: Media Bias in Covering Palestine and Israel
description:
Shereen walks us through how media bias and irresponsible journalism unfairly frames the public perception of Palestine and Israel.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
